E000: Fuser problem. Temperature too low. Heat lamp, thermal fuse or thermoswitch, thermistor, triac etc
Fuser problem. Temperature too high. Probably triac
Drive problem. Could be main motor, scan motor, cleaning web motor or duplex motor
Main motor, scan motor, cleaner belt motor, duplex motor, toner motor, lens motor or driver bd. for any of these
Toner sensor problem or lack of toner feed. This occurs if toner feed signal is present for 3 min
Toner empty sensor sees no toner added for 3 min probably toner feed problem
Lens home sensor or lens won`t leave home
DC controller or document feed board
Finisher; feed motor, pulse sensor, finisher board
Finisher; stack motor, stack tray sensor, finisher board
Finisher; guide plate motor, stapler guide, finisher board
